Question.Subject: Can you help make a signature for my namee?
Question.Content:
Hey theree :]
So for hotmail, you know when you can add a signature at the bottom of an e-mail?
I was wondering if you can make a signature for me, with my name which is Marianna. Can you make it like, cool?
XP
LOL
I dont know, I used to usee :
__ __ _ | \/ | (_) | \ / | __ _ _ __ _ __ _ _ __ _ __ __ | |\/| |/ _` | '__| |/ _` | '_ \| '_ \ / _` | | | | | (_| | | | | (_| | | | | | | | (_| | |_| |_|\__,_|_| |_|\__,| | |_|_| ||\__,_|
Yeah it doesnt work that properly with the font on Yahoo But can you help make another onee? THANKS. XD
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Go here:
http://www.network-science.de/ascii/
Put in your name
Select _all fonts with your text_
Then Click Do it!
It should give you like a whole bunch :)

Answer.Content:
Go here:
http://www.network-science.de/ascii/
Put in your name
Select _all fonts with your text_
Then Click Do it!
It should give you like a whole bunch :)
